Package jcolibri.util

Interface Summary
LogListener Classes that want to receive the log data must implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
BrowserControl A simple, static class to display a URL in the system browser.
CaseCreatorUtils Utilties for creating cases.
CBRLogger Utilities for creating an application run time log.
ClassDiscover Utilities for look for classes in run time.
CompileAndRun Utilities for compile and run and application in a java source file.
FileUtil Utilities to help when working with files.
ImagesContainer  
JColibriClassHelper Utility class with help method to manage classes
Launcher This class launches jCOLIBRI
ProgressBar Progress bar window that shows methods progress.
XMLUtil Utilities to help when working with XML data.
